overview: When John Delta finds out his boyfriend's been betrayed by his cheating, he is devastated. That is, until he decides to party his pain away. A handsome and mysterious young man hands him a card with a bandana at the club. With his interest peaked, and his ass hungry, John follows his instinct to check out the address on the card.  Leon Lewis is there to greet him, face covered, shirtless, and a thick uncut and meaty treat for John to discover. The pair don't waste any time and start sucking dick and eating ass. When Leon rams his massive raw piece into John's beautiful hole, all the day's troubles seem like a distant memory.
title: Betrayed
